data.approach: Edited complete.md to remove all references to showing available tasks or recommending next tasks at completion. Reinforced one-agent-one-task principle.

filesModified.description: Removed Available Tasks section, updated summary and announcement

reviewFocus: Verify the one-agent-one-task principle is now consistently applied
Check that completion summary still includes useful info (accomplishments, suggestions, human actions)

data.taskTitle: completed tasks should not offer next task
completed tasks should not offer next task - enhance terminal debrief
data.taskDescription: The completion summary needs to be a full text representation of the signal event - showing summary, suggested tasks details, human actions, cross-agent intel, and pattern applicability.
data.approach: Update the terminal completion summary template in complete.md to show full details instead of just counts. Include: (1) Full summary bullets, (2) Each suggested task with title, type, priority, (3) Human actions with descriptions, (4) Cross-agent intel with files, patterns, gotchas, (5) Pattern applicability section.

summary: Changed terminal completion output from brief log to comprehensive full debrief
Added box-formatted sections: WHAT WAS ACCOMPLISHED, QUALITY STATUS, HUMAN ACTIONS REQUIRED, SUGGESTED FOLLOW-UP TASKS, CROSS-AGENT INTEL, PATTERN APPLICABILITY

suggestedTasks.title: Validate full debrief format in production usage
suggestedTasks.description: Monitor agent completions over the next few days to ensure the new full debrief format is being used correctly and provides good UX for terminal users

suggestedTasks.title: Add completion summary linting to hooks
suggestedTasks.description: Consider adding a PostToolUse hook that validates completion summaries include all required sections
suggestedTasks.reason: Would help enforce consistency across agents

patterns: Terminal completion summaries should now use box-formatted sections
Include full details in each section, not just counts
The terminal debrief mirrors what the dashboard signal shows
gotchas: Omit sections if empty - do not show None placeholders
PATTERN APPLICABILITY section is optional but valuable when applicable
